nodes.text: The Thief's Eye was the personal Peregrine-class star yacht of the Toydarian King Katuunko.

Katuunko traveled in the ship to the coral moon of Rugosa for negotiations with Jedi Master Yoda to build a Republic base in the Toydaria system. Upon Katuunko rejecting the Separatist's offer of an alliance, Count Dooku's assassin, Asajj Ventress, detonated bombs near the ship, causing the Toydarian ship to be severely damaged.

However, the ship was repaired and stationed at the Toydarian palace when Dooku's new assassin, Savage Opress, arrived on the planet and went through a deadly rampage, kidnapping Katuunko and destroying the T-6 shuttle used by the pursuing Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker. The Jedi used the Thief's Eye to follow Opress to Dooku's flagship.
